_instructions: Replace all PLACEHOLDER values with your brand-specific information. Remove this _instructions field when complete.
sourceDocument: Brand Guidelines PDF filename or source

brandEssence.positioning: Brand positioning statement describing what you deliver and to whom

toneOfVoice.description: Description of how the brand should sound and feel in communications

logo.description: Description of your brand logo and its key characteristics

rules.name: Logo Presence
rules.requirement: Logo must be present on all brand materials

rules.name: Logo Integrity
rules.requirement: Logo must not be stretched, distorted, rotated, or modified

rules.name: Minimum Size - Digital
rules.requirement: Logo must be at least XXXpx wide for digital applications

rules.name: Minimum Size - Print
rules.requirement: Logo must be at least X inch (XXmm) wide for print applications

rules.name: Clear Space
rules.requirement: Maintain minimum clear space around logo (define measurement reference)
rules.reference: height of X character or specific pixel value

rules.name: Approved Color Versions
rules.requirement: Use only approved logo color versions

rules.name: Background Contrast
rules.requirement: Logo must have sufficient contrast against background

rules.name: No Effects
rules.requirement: Do not apply shadows, glows, gradients, or other effects to the logo

prohibitions: Do not stretch or distort the logo
Do not change logo colors outside approved versions
Do not add shadows, glows, or effects
Do not place logo on busy or low-contrast backgrounds
Do not crop or partially obscure the logo

colors.description: Brand color palette description and usage context

rules.name: Approved Palette Only
rules.requirement: Only use colors from the approved brand color palette

rules.name: Primary Color Dominance
rules.requirement: Primary brand color should be dominant in key brand moments

rules.name: Color Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Follow color hierarchy: Primary (60%), Secondary (30%), Accent (10%)

rules.name: Color Accuracy
rules.requirement: Colors must match exact hex/RGB values within tolerance

rules.name: Prohibited Colors
rules.requirement: Do not use colors that conflict with brand identity

prohibitedColors.reason: Pure red reserved for errors only

rules.name: Primary Font Family
rules.requirement: Use approved font families only

rules.name: Font Weights
rules.requirement: Use only approved font weights

rules.name: Minimum Body Text Size
rules.requirement: Body text must be at least 16px for digital, 10pt for print

rules.name: Minimum Caption Size
rules.requirement: No text smaller than 12px for digital, 8pt for print

rules.name: Heading Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Headings must follow clear size hierarchy

rules.name: Line Height
rules.requirement: Body text line height should be 1.4-1.6 for optimal readability

rules.name: Line Length
rules.requirement: Body text line length should be 50-75 characters

rules.name: Text Alignment
rules.requirement: Use left-aligned text for body copy

rules.name: Normal Text Contrast
rules.requirement: Normal text (<18px or <14px bold) must have minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio

rules.name: Large Text Contrast
rules.requirement: Large text (≥18px or ≥14px bold) must have minimum 3:1 contrast ratio

rules.name: UI Component Contrast
rules.requirement: Interactive UI components must have minimum 3:1 contrast

rules.name: Minimum Text Size
rules.requirement: No text smaller than 12px (16px preferred for body)

rules.name: Color Independence
rules.requirement: Information must not be conveyed by color alone

rules.name: Touch Target Size
rules.requirement: Interactive elements must have minimum 44x44px touch target

rules.name: Focus Indicators
rules.requirement: All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators

rules.name: Image Alt Text
rules.requirement: All meaningful images must have descriptive alt text

rules.name: Image Quality
rules.requirement: Images must be high resolution - minimum 72dpi for web, 300dpi for print

rules.name: Authentic Representation
rules.requirement: Use authentic, diverse imagery showing real people

rules.name: Brand Tone Alignment
rules.requirement: Imagery should align with brand tone and values

rules.name: Lighting Quality
rules.requirement: Use appropriate lighting for brand feel

rules.name: Diversity & Inclusion
rules.requirement: Imagery must represent diverse audiences

rules.name: Product Photography
rules.requirement: Product shots should be clean, well-lit, and accurate

rules.name: Logo Placement
rules.requirement: Logo should be in preferred positions for applications

rules.name: Grid System
rules.requirement: Use base grid for all spacing and alignment

rules.name: Visual Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Establish clear visual hierarchy

rules.name: Whitespace
rules.requirement: Maintain generous whitespace

rules.name: CTA Prominence
rules.requirement: Call-to-action must be clearly visible

rules.name: Content Margins
rules.requirement: Maintain minimum margins

rules.name: Brand Voice Consistency
rules.requirement: All copy should reflect brand tone

rules.name: Claim Substantiation
rules.requirement: All claims must be substantiated and compliant

rules.name: Required Disclaimers
rules.requirement: Include required legal disclaimers where applicable
